name: 1L
description:
HOW TO PLAY: use UP, DOWN, LEFT, and RIGTH to move the ship, Z, X, C to shoot the different weapons. While shooting missiles (X Key) press Space to spread the missiles. The game is over if your power bar reaches 0. Shoot wisely because every shoot you fire will consume fire.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Project for web Monetization Challenge Jam.

If you have a browser with any Web monetization enabled, you can survive for longer in the game, you receive a Power bonus every 60 seconds.

The game is still incomplete, there are many things I would like to add to the game, but didn't have the time.

There is a secret in the game, if you manage to decode the Secret Message bellow.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Secret Message:

RRAAIOIOYX / RT23
